field.label: Description

field.label: Suppression Rules
field.help:
Valid keywords are 'suppress', 'event_filter' and 'threshold'.
Example 1: suppress gen_id 1, sig_id 1852, track by_src, ip 10.1.1.54
Example 2: event_filter gen_id 1, sig_id 1851, type limit, track by_src, count 1, seconds 60
Example 3: threshold gen_id 135, sig_id 1, type threshold, track by_src, count 100, seconds 1
